originalText.text: Dr Savetsky is an extremely competent and compassionate physician. His office staff went above and beyond to ensure all my concerns were addressed. The doctor personally checked up on me the day after my procedure. I highly recommend him to anyone in pursuit of cosmetic and reconstructive surgery!

The doctor personally checked up on me the day after my procedure. I highly recommend him to anyone in pursuit of cosmetic and reconstructive surgery!

originalText.text: Wonderful and warm experience from the moment I got to the office. Dr. Savetsky is very kind and friendly. He is an excellent surgeon who can listen and discuss. I highly recommend him to anyone who is looking for an amazing specialist and surgeon.

text.text: Wonderful and warm experience from the moment I got to the office. Dr. Savetsky is very kind and friendly. He is an excellent surgeon who can listen and discuss. I highly recommend him to anyone who is looking for an amazing specialist and surgeon.

originalText.text:
Making the decision to have facial plastic surgery and finding the surgeon to do the job is quite a journey. New York has many qualified Surgeons to choose from and I interviewed several and finally chose Dr Savetsky. I think it was his sincerity , honesty and humble approach that convinced me. He gave me a very realistic opinion of what I could expect and what would look natural to me. I also found his pricing to be very realistic. I was paying for the work and not the brand. I had my neck, face , eyes and hands done. The procedure was performed in a state of the art private operating room and everything went as planed. It is now one week after surgery and couldn’t be happier with the results. Two days of discomfort and no pain. Some tightness but very minor. Very little loss of feeling, which I know will resolve. It is very important to follow the pre-op regimen and to also be in good health prior to surgery to have such an easy recovery. Several of my friends have had work done with other doctors and have much longer recovery periods, the reasons are hard to say.
After Surgery Dr Savitsky visited me everyday for 5 days to check on my progress, which was beyond my expectation.
So to sum up my experience and recommendation, if You’re looking for a Dr who will be honest with expectations, excellent in execution, fairly priced and a friend then go with Dr Savitsky.
In addition , his office assistant, Sonia is a gem. She glides you through all the arrangements.

originalText.text: Dr Savetsky is a wonderful surgeon with a skill for perfection. I was referred to him through a family friend who was also very happy with her procedure. Highly recommend him

text.text: Dr Savetsky is a wonderful surgeon with a skill for perfection. I was referred to him through a family friend who was also very happy with her procedure. Highly recommend him

originalText.text:
It is been six weeks since I did my breasts reduction surgery and I wish I did it earlier . My back doesn't hurt anymore, my neck doesn't hurt , I stand up straighter and esthetically I LOOK SO MUCH BETTER!
I lucked out with Dr  SAVETSKY & his team.
The premises where the procedure was done , the anesthesiologist were absolutely top of the line . I woke up and the nurse was at my side helping me with great care and a great smile . More importantly I Didn't have any side reactions.
( my friend who had done same procedure with another surgeon ,was nauseous from the anesthesia for a whole week .) .
The after care of  Dr Savetsky and his team were unreal. I felt so pampered. Sonia even insisted in putting me in the Uber lol .I could have gotten in by myself.
While on vacation with his family , Dr Savetsky texted me  to check that I was allright ! That topped it all !
I was so touched when I received from his practice a package of roses on Friday afternoon, wishing me fast recovery.

It took me a while to look at myself in the mirror and when I did I luved my new me.
I looked like back in my university days lol. Great job. I told Dr Savetsky that I will call him the Versace of plastic surgery. Artistically and medically greatly done .
Super thanks .
A very laid back Dr & practice. Did not push me/ sell me  into more plastic surgery or Botox ..
Very professional. I highly recommend.
